languages.text: {n}С десяток человек — взрослых и детей — испуганно жмутся друг к другу. У половины из них вы видите {d|Encyclopedia:Ch1_Raycad_Late}черные дыры вместо глаз{/d}. Пока одни подавленно молчат, другие заходятся в плаче. Несколько вооруженных мятежников внимательно следят за испуганными заложниками, то и дело покрикивая на тех, кто дергается слишком резко или кричит слишком громко.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}С десяток человек — взрослых и детей — испуганно жмутся друг к другу. У половины из них вы видите черные дыры вместо глаз. Пока одни подавленно молчат, другие заходятся в плаче. Несколько вооруженных мятежников внимательно следят за испуганными заложниками, то и дело покрикивая на тех, кто дергается слишком резко или кричит слишком громко.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Some ten people, children among them, are huddling together in fear. You see that half of them have {d|Encyclopedia:Ch1_Raycad_Late}black holes where their eyes used to be{/d}. Some maintain a gloomy silence. Others are wailing. Several armed insurgents are carefully watching over the terrified hostages, snapping every now and then at someone for shaking too much or crying too loudly.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}С десяток человек — взрослых и детей — испуганно жмутся друг к другу. У половины из них вы видите {d|Encyclopedia:Ch1_Raycad_Late}черные дыры вместо глаз{/d}. Пока одни подавленно молчат, другие заходятся в плаче. Несколько вооруженных мятежников внимательно следят за испуганными заложниками, то и дело покрикивая на тех, кто дергается слишком резко или кричит слишком громко.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Some ten people, children among them, are huddling together in fear. You see that half of them have black holes where their eyes used to be. Some keep a gloomy silence. Others are wailing. Several armed insurgents are carefully watching over the terrified hostages, snapping every now and then at someone who's winced too sharply or is crying too loudly.{/n}

{n}Some ten people, children among them, are huddling together in fear. You see that half of them have black holes where their eyes used to be. Some keep a gloomy silence. Others are wailing. Several armed insurgents are carefully watching over the terrified hostages, snapping every now and then at someone who's winced too sharply or is crying too loudly.{/n}

{n}Some ten people, children among them, are huddling together in fear. You see that half of them have black holes where their eyes used to be. Some keep a gloomy silence. Others are wailing. Several armed insurgents are carefully watching over the terrified hostages, snapping every now and then at someone for wincing too sharply or crying too loudly.{/n}

{n}Some ten people, children among them, are huddling together in fear. You see that half of them have black holes where their eyes used to be. Some keep a gloomy silence. Others are wailing. Several armed insurgents are carefully watching over the terrified hostages, snapping every now and then at someone for wincing too sharply or crying too loudly.{/n}

{n}Some ten people, children among them, are huddling together in fear. You see that half of them have black holes where their eyes used to be. Some maintain a gloomy silence. Others are wailing. Several armed insurgents are carefully watching over the terrified hostages, snapping every now and then at someone for shaking too much or crying too loudly.{/n}

{n}Some ten people, children among them, are huddling together in fear. You see that half of them have black holes where their eyes used to be. Some maintain a gloomy silence. Others are wailing. Several armed insurgents are carefully watching over the terrified hostages, snapping every now and then at someone for shaking too much or crying too loudly.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Eine Gruppe von etwa zehn Leuten, darunter auch Kinder, kauert sich verängstigt zusammen. Du siehst, dass die Hälfte davon nur {d|Encyclopedia:Ch1_Raycad_Late}schwarze Löcher haben, wo einst ihre Augen waren{/d}. Manche schweigen mit düsterer Miene. Andere heulen und schluchzen. Mehrere bewaffnete Aufständische bewachen die verängstigten Geiseln mit strengen Blicken. Hin und wieder blaffen sie eine Geisel an, weil sie zu stark zittert oder zu laut weint.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Some ten people, children among them, are huddling together in fear. You see that half of them have {d|Encyclopedia:Ch1_Raycad_Late}black holes where their eyes used to be{/d}. Some maintain a gloomy silence. Others are wailing. Several armed insurgents are carefully watching over the terrified hostages, snapping every now and then at someone for shaking too much or crying too loudly.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Eine Gruppe von etwa zehn Leuten, darunter auch Kinder, kauert sich verängstigt zusammen. Du siehst, dass die Hälfte davon nur schwarze Löcher haben, wo einst ihre Augen waren. Manche schweigen mit düsterer Miene. Andere heulen und schluchzen. Mehrere bewaffnete Aufständische bewachen die verängstigten Geiseln mit strengen Blicken. Hin und wieder blaffen sie eine Geisel an, weil sie zu scharf stöhnt oder zu laut weint.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Une dizaine de personnes apeurées, dont des enfants, se serrent les unes contre les autres. Vous voyez que la moitié d'entre elles ont des {d|Encyclopedia:Ch1_Raycad_Late}trous noirs à la place des yeux{/d}. Certaines gardent un silence sinistre. D'autres gémissent. Plusieurs insurgés armés surveillent attentivement les otages terrifiés, en hurlant de temps à autre sur quelqu'un qui tremble trop ou pleure trop bruyamment.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Some ten people, children among them, are huddling together in fear. You see that half of them have {d|Encyclopedia:Ch1_Raycad_Late}black holes where their eyes used to be{/d}. Some maintain a gloomy silence. Others are wailing. Several armed insurgents are carefully watching over the terrified hostages, snapping every now and then at someone for shaking too much or crying too loudly.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Une dizaine de personnes apeurées, dont des enfants, se serrent les unes contre les autres. Vous voyez que la moitié d'entre elles ont des trous noirs à la place des yeux. Certaines gardent un silence sinistre. D'autres gémissent. Plusieurs insurgés armés surveillent attentivement les otages terrifiés, en hurlant de temps à autre sur quelqu'un qui grimace trop ou pleure trop bruyamment.{/n}

languages.text: {n}十几个人正害怕地挤在一起，其中还有孩子。其中一半人的眼睛已经不见了，{d|Encyclopedia:Ch1_Raycad_Late}原本是眼睛的地方只剩下黑漆漆的空洞{/d}。一部分保持着阴郁的沉默，剩下的人则在哭泣。几名全副武装的叛军士兵正在小心翼翼地监视着这些惊恐的人质，时不时揍几下那些抖得太厉害，或哭得太响的人。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Some ten people, children among them, are huddling together in fear. You see that half of them have {d|Encyclopedia:Ch1_Raycad_Late}black holes where their eyes used to be{/d}. Some maintain a gloomy silence. Others are wailing. Several armed insurgents are carefully watching over the terrified hostages, snapping every now and then at someone for shaking too much or crying too loudly.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}十几个人正害怕地挤在一起，其中还有孩子。其中一半人的眼睛已经不见了，原本是眼睛的地方只剩下黑漆漆的空洞。一部分保持着阴郁的沉默，剩下的人则在哭泣。几名全副武装的叛军士兵正在小心翼翼地监视着这些惊恐的人质，时不时揍几下那些拼命挣扎或哭得太响的人。{/n}

languages.text: {n}約10人、その中には子供も混じっており、恐怖の中に身を寄せている。半数以上は、{d|Encyclopedia:Ch1_Raycad_Late}目の代わりに真っ黒な穴が開いている{/d}。何人かは黙り込み、他には泣いている者もいる。武装した反乱者たちが、恐怖に怯える人質たちを注意深く見張り、時折、身を震わせすぎたり、大声で泣いたりした者に対し叫んでいた。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Some ten people, children among them, are huddling together in fear. You see that half of them have {d|Encyclopedia:Ch1_Raycad_Late}black holes where their eyes used to be{/d}. Some maintain a gloomy silence. Others are wailing. Several armed insurgents are carefully watching over the terrified hostages, snapping every now and then at someone for shaking too much or crying too loudly.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}約10人、その中には子供も混じっており、恐怖の中に身を寄せている。半数以上は、目の代わりに真っ黒な穴が開いている。何人かは黙り込み、他には泣いている者もいる。武装した反乱者たちが、恐怖に怯える人質たちを注意深く見張り、時折、身を震わせたり、大声を上げたりした者に対し叫んでいた。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Unas diez personas, con niños entre ellas, se acurrucan asustadas. Ves que la mitad de ellos tienen {d|Encyclopedia:Ch1_Raycad_Late}agujeros negros donde deberían estar sus ojos{/d}. Algunos guardan un sombrío silencio. Otros lloran. Varios insurgentes armados vigilan atentamente a los aterrorizados rehenes, regañando de vez en cuando a alguno por temblar demasiado o llorar demasiado alto.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Some ten people, children among them, are huddling together in fear. You see that half of them have {d|Encyclopedia:Ch1_Raycad_Late}black holes where their eyes used to be{/d}. Some maintain a gloomy silence. Others are wailing. Several armed insurgents are carefully watching over the terrified hostages, snapping every now and then at someone for shaking too much or crying too loudly.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Unas diez personas, con niños entre ellas, se acurrucan asustadas. Ves que la mitad de ellos tienen agujeros negros donde solían estar sus ojos. Algunos guardan un sombrío silencio. Otros lloran. Varios insurgentes armados vigilan atentamente a los aterrorizados rehenes, regañando de vez en cuando a alguno por hacer un gesto demasiado brusco o llorar demasiado alto.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Aralarında çocukların da bulunduğu yaklaşık on kişi, korku içinde bir araya toplanmış. Yarısının yüzünde, {d|Encyclopedia:Ch1_Raycad_Late}gözlerinin olması gereken yerde kara boşluklar{/d} var. Bazılarının üstüne kasvetli bir sükûnet çökmüş. Diğerleriyse ağlıyor. Birkaç silahlı asi, dehşete düşmüş rehineleri dikkatle izliyor. Arada sırada çok titreyen ya da yüksek sesle ağlayan biri olursa bağırıyorlar.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Some ten people, children among them, are huddling together in fear. Several armed insurgents are carefully watching over the terrified hostages, snapping every now and then at someone for shaking too much or crying too loudly.{/n}

Bazılarının üstüne kasvetli bir sükûnet çökmüş. Diğerleriyse ağlıyor. Birkaç silahlı asi, dehşete düşmüş rehineleri dikkatle izliyor. Arada sırada çok titreyen ya da yüksek sesle ağlayan biri olursa bağırıyorlar.{/n}
